title: Constant 1000 ping?
body: Why? This happened right after the patch, every second game i lag like hell, and it's really frustrating, can someone help me?

replies.body:
What ISP are you with, and what OS are you on?

Do you have any applications running in the background?
no i've closed everything, i'm with tesltra and windows 7

Have you tried uninstalling any anti-viruses/firewalls you may have?

Your OS and ISP are really stable systems, so it shouldn't be those causing the issue.

Where are you connecting from?

Run this tool here http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/tools/network-logs and then email that to ocelivereports@riotgames.com
